title: Amber Rose shares cute snaps of baby boy Slash bonding with his dad
text:
Baby Slash is already spoiled with affection (Picture: Mega, Instagram, Amber Rose)

Amber Rose must have felt her heart melt as she watched her boyfriend, Alexander ‘AE’ Edwards, bond with their baby son Slash.

The 35-year-old model gave birth to their first child together last week and it’s clear the tot has taken quite a liking to his father.

In a sweet Instagram story video, Alexander is seen with his arm wrapped around the beautiful boy while snuggling into his face and showering him with kisses.

Slash, who is merely a few days old, clearly loved the affection and was seen wriggling excitedly on the bed.

Our hearts.

Amber announced the arrival of their bundle of joy on Friday and revealed his absolute rockstar name, which was chosen in tribute to Slash from her favourite band Guns N’ Roses.

‘Slash Electric Alexander Edwards.. the world is urs now,’ Amber told her Instagram followers.

Daddy’s boy (Picture: Amber Rose, Instagram)

Slash was loving all the cuddles (Picture: Amber Rose, Instagram)

‘Thank u @amberrose for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar.’

She accompanied the announcement with a sweet photo of Alexander kissing Slash on the head while cradling the newborn.

So is he a mummy’s boy or daddy’s boy? Probably both.

Amber had endured what felt like the world’s longest pregnancy and was often seen out with her large baby bump in the final days of her pregnancy. Alexander proved to be the supportive boyfriend and was often by her side, giving her a helping hand or keeping her spirits up with his cheerful demeanour.

Just last week, Amber had joked that she was ‘still pregnant’ after passing the nine week mark around four weeks ago.

It hadn’t been an easy pregnancy either as the SlutWalk founder revealed she was suffering from hyperemesis gravidarum, an extreme form of morning sickness.

Opening up about her plight, Amber previous said: ‘I said I was going to document this pregnancy a little bit more than I did with Sebastian, ’cause with Sebastian I had hyperemesis, and I have hyperemesis again with this baby. And for people that don’t know what it is, it’s basically extreme nausea, vomiting and dehydration.

‘I can eat a little bit more now cause I’m in my second trimester, but not much, and I pretty much sleep all day.’

She added optimistically: ‘But all in all, babies are a blessing, and God bless women, man. We are resilient, we get through it. You know, it’s really, really hard being pregnant.’

The model is already mum to six-year-old son Sebastian, whom she shares with ex-husband Wiz Khalifa.

Amber and Alex, a 32-year-old vice president of A&R for Def Jam Records, have been dating since September 2018 although they first met in 2015.
